summary: Madame Rosa lives in a sixth-floor walkup in the Pigalle; she's a retired prostitute, Jewish and an Auschwitz survivor, a foster mom to children of other prostitutes. Momo is the oldest and... See full summary »
cast: Simone Signoret|Michal Bat-Adam|Samy Ben-Youb|Gabriel Jabbour|Geneviève Fontanel|Bernard Lajarrige|Mohamed Zinet|Elio Bencoil|Stella Annicette|El Kebir|Ibrahim Seck|Math Samba|Claude Dauphin|Théo Légitimus|Nadia Samir|Elisabeth Margoni|Renata Flores|Jacqueline Rouillard|Ghazy Younès|Fabien Belhassen|Jacky Belhassen|Costa-Gavras
title: Madame Rosa
